thread.title: chintoo

author: chintoo
title: chintoo
text: Dont Answer the phones very bad customer service. I Called them as mentioned by them between to call between 9:00 AM to 18:00 PM（PST）Monday-Friday.but no one is answering my call i Called them atleast 10-15 times.Why is you customer service very very bad....Can't you appoint more employees to attend all calls and respond to them Because people from all around the globe who have placed the order will be trying to reach you .If your hotline number is soo poor then it is better you wrap up USGOBUY...
